PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08622018-06-21,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 215, NewBrunswick.
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 215 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the provision of financial assistance to the province of NEW BRUNSWICK, with respect to Heavy rainfall, snow melt and mild temperatures throughout the province starting on April 26, 2018 to May 14, 2018, caused historical levels of flooding, infrastructure damage, road closures and significant damages to private properties.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
